alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 4:21PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Tooele County through 500 PM MDT... At 421 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Dugway English Village, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wendover, Dugway English Village, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Utah Test and Training Range South, Knolls, Clive and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 0 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
